label: 綾
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 57th  . Nara National Museum . 2005
説明文: Patterned, monochrome weave textiles, including damask and liseré. Also twill weave structure. In the Shōsō-in, this term most frequently refers to damask twills, monochrome textiles of degummed silk in which the ground weave and pattern weave have different binding systems. [正倉院]
